Uses of Package
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.events

Packages that use io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.events
Package
Description
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.handlers
This package contains all variations of ItemHandler that can be assigned to a SlimefunItem
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.handlers
This package holds simple implementations of ItemHandler.
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners
This package contains all implementations of Listener that Slimefun uses.
  • Classes in io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.events used by io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.handlers
    Class
    Description
    AndroidMineEvent
    This Event is fired before a MinerAndroid mines a Block.
    BlockPlacerPlaceEvent
    This Event is fired whenever a BlockPlacer wants to place a Block.
    PlayerRightClickEvent
    The PlayerRightClickEvent is our custom version of the PlayerInteractEvent.
  • Classes in io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.events used by io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.handlers
    Class
    Description
    AndroidMineEvent
    This Event is fired before a MinerAndroid mines a Block.
  • Classes in io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.events used by io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners
    Class
    Description
    AndroidMineEvent
    This Event is fired before a MinerAndroid mines a Block.
    ExplosiveToolBreakBlocksEvent
    This Event is called when an ExplosiveTool is used to break blocks.
    PlayerRightClickEvent
    The PlayerRightClickEvent is our custom version of the PlayerInteractEvent.
    SlimefunBlockBreakEvent
    This Event is fired whenever a SlimefunItem placed as a Block in the world is broken.
    SlimefunBlockPlaceEvent
    This Event is fired whenever a SlimefunItem is placed as a Block in the world.
